trans-unit.source: Prerequisite: Install the Azure PowerShell Module
trans-unit.target: Prerequisite: Install the Azure PowerShell Module

trans-unit.source: To perform the steps in this article, you'll need to [to install and configure Azure PowerShell](../articles/powershell-install-configure.md) and follow the instructions all the way to the end to sign into Azure and select your subscription.
trans-unit.target: To perform the steps in this article, you'll need to [to install and configure Azure PowerShell](../articles/powershell-install-configure.md) and follow the instructions all the way to the end to sign into Azure and select your subscription.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If you don't have an Azure account, you'll need one.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If you don't have an Azure account, you'll need one.

trans-unit.source: Go sign up for a [free trial here](../articles/active-directory/sign-up-organization.md).
trans-unit.target: Go sign up for a [free trial here](../articles/active-directory/sign-up-organization.md).
